summary: Frontend testing completed for MegaRadio Expo app. Tested login flow, i18n integration, skeleton loaders, home page sections, favorites empty state, and languages page. All tested features are working correctly.

issues: 520 errors for font files (Ubuntu, Ionicons) - known issue from previous iterations
Mixed Content warnings for some station favicon URLs using http:// (auto-upgraded to HTTPS by browser)

critical_code_review_comments: i18n integration is properly implemented using react-i18next
useTranslation hook is correctly imported and used across pages (index.tsx, discover.tsx, favorites.tsx, notifications.tsx, users.tsx, languages.tsx)
Skeleton components are properly created in /app/frontend/src/components/Skeleton.tsx with shimmer animation effect
i18nService.ts correctly initializes i18n and handles language changes via AsyncStorage
Login flow correctly maps API user response to internal User type with avatar URL normalization
context_for_next_testing_agent: All i18n integration, login flow, and skeleton loaders are working correctly. The app correctly handles: 1) Login with email/password - redirects to tabs after successful login, 2) i18n translations - all text keys like 'genres', 'popular_stations', 'recently_played', 'stations_near_you', 'discover', 'browse_genres', 'top_stations', 'favorites', 'languages' are translating correctly, 3) Skeleton loaders are defined but appear briefly during loading states, 4) Favorites empty state shows 'You don't have any favorites yet' for guest users, 5) Languages page shows full list of languages with radio button selection

login_flow.navigate_to_login: PASS - Guest > Auth Options > Login With Mail
login_flow.fill_credentials: PASS - Email and password fields properly filled
login_flow.submit_login: PASS - API returns token and user data
login_flow.redirect_to_tabs: PASS - After login, redirected to home page with user name 'Cuneyt'
login_flow.api_response_format: PASS - Returns {success: true, token: 'mrt_...', user: {...}, message: 'Login successful'}

i18n_integration.home_page_sections: PASS - Genres, See All, Popular Stations, Recently Played, Radios Near You, Favorites From Users - all translated correctly
i18n_integration.discover_page: PASS - 'Discover', 'Explore the world of radio', 'Browse Genres', 'Top Stations', 'See All' - all translated
i18n_integration.useTranslation_hook: PASS - t() function calls working across all tested pages

skeleton_loaders.component_exists: PASS - Skeleton.tsx contains: Skeleton, StationCardSkeleton, GenreCardSkeleton, UserItemSkeleton, NotificationItemSkeleton, StationListItemSkeleton, SectionSkeleton, GenreGridSkeleton, DiscoverSkeleton, ProfileSkeleton
skeleton_loaders.shimmer_animation: PASS - Uses Animated.loop with LinearGradient for shimmer effect
skeleton_loaders.usage_in_pages: PASS - SectionSkeleton used in index.tsx, StationListItemSkeleton used in discover.tsx, UserItemSkeleton used in users.tsx

home_page_sections.genres: PASS - Shows Pop, Music, News, Rock, Classical, Talk, Entretenimiento, Radio
home_page_sections.popular_stations: PASS - Shows MANGORADIO, Dance Wave!, REYFM, Radio Paradise
home_page_sections.recently_played: PASS - Shows 'No recently played stations' for new users
home_page_sections.radios_near_you: PASS - Shows nearby stations based on location
home_page_sections.favorites_from_users: PASS - Shows user profiles with their favorite counts

favorites_page.empty_state: PASS - Shows empty heart icon, 'You don't have any favorites yet', and 'Discover stations near to you!' link

languages_page.language_list: PASS - Shows English, Turkish, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Arabic, and more
languages_page.radio_selection: PASS - English shows selected (pink filled radio button)
languages_page.native_names: PASS - Shows both English and native names (e.g., 'Türkçe', 'Deutsch', 'Français')

profile_page.guest_state: PASS - Shows 'Sign in to access your profile, favorites, and more' with 'Sign In / Sign Up' button
